reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly and makes physics interesting. Her problem-solving sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Chen's passion for literature is contagious. His classes are always engaging and thought-provoking. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez knows her stuff, but her teaching style can be a bit dry. The assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's lectures are hard to follow. He often seems unprepared and struggles to answer students' questions clearly.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is an outstanding professor! She brings psychology to life with real-world examples and interactive discussions. Her enthusiasm is infectious.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown has an encyclopedic knowledge of history. His lectures are fascinating, though sometimes he goes off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wang is knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Her exams are tough, but she offers good support during office hours.
